name: Argentinean Roast
description: A grilled cut of beef, slowly cooked for unique tenderness and flavor. Includes chorizo, blood sausage, and offal.

name: Creole Empanadas
description: Classic empanadas filled with knife-cut beef, onion, pepper, olives, and hard-boiled egg. Ideal for sharing.

name: Potato Cake
description: A comforting classic. Layers of seasoned ground beef and creamy mashed potatoes, oven-baked.

name: Neapolitan Milanese
description: Breaded and fried beef steak, covered with tomato sauce, ham and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Locro
description: Traditional Argentine stew, thick and hearty, with corn, beans, beef, pork, chorizo, and vegetables. Ideal for cool days.

name: Rioja-style steak
description: Good steak with the richness of the potatoes, the sweetness of the ham and bell pepper, the freshness of the peas and the smoothness of the fried egg.

name: Chocolate Volcano
description: small baked chocolate cake, the center of which remains liquid and warm, simulating the lava of a volcano when cut.

name: Dulce de leche pancakes
description: They consist of thin sheets of dough, generously sprinkled with dulce de leche, that Argentine delicacy made from caramelized milk, with a sweet and intense flavor and a smooth and creamy texture.

name: Homemade flan
description: It is made primarily with eggs, milk, and sugar, cooked in a bain-marie to achieve a delicate and uniform consistency.

name: Tiramis√∫
description: Classic and sophisticated Italian dessert, highly appreciated worldwide
